methods.Synopsis: Returns campaign details for one campaign
Returns analytical data over a given time interval. Results include impressions, conversion, costs, clicks, ctr, and cpc for each campaign.

parameters.Name: site_id
parameters.Description: Limits the results to the campaigns underneath the given site.

parameters.Name: campaign_id
parameters.Description: Limits the results to a specific campaign. Overrides the 'site_id' parameter.

parameters.Name: interval
parameters.Description: Limits the results to a time interval. All results are in Eastern Time.

parameters.Name: start_date
parameters.Description: Explicit start date for a time interval. Format: YYYY-mm-dd. Date is in Eastern Time. Must include an end_date if using start_date.

parameters.Name: end_date
parameters.Description: Explicit end date for a time interval. Format: YYYY-mm-dd. Date is in Eastern Time. Must include a start_date if using end_date.
